name: @akolos/s3-object-location-parsing
description: Utilities for parsing S3 object keys and location/source strings.

scripts.quick: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run start
scripts.build: npm run clean && tsc && tsc --m commonjs --outDir build/cjs/ --declaration false
scripts.build:watch: npm run clean && tsc -w && tsc --outDir build/cjs --m commonjs --declaration false
scripts.precommit: npm run lint:fix && npm run format && npm run test
